name: The $100 Hat
description:
Very Rare Pieces is a limited edition capsule collection designed by Terrell Wright and executed by Barely Graduated. The design theme for this collection is heavily influenced by Japanese street wear which is generally characterized by its bold use of layering and experimental silhouettes; With that in mind Very Rare Pieces concentrates on the fit of the clothing, the details of the design, and a monochromatic imagery.  Extremely limited in quantity and of the highest quality... Very Rare Pieces   
 
The $100 Hat is a ultra soft black lambskin leather top brim with a black tonal paisley print bottom brim and gloss black snakeskin strap with chrome buckle. The front of the hat has two vintage black matte U.S. Air Force Aircrew pins. 

The design of this strap-back hat is a combination of three things 

1. The Definition of 5-panel hats ( 5-panel hats get their name by being made up of five pieces of fabric, each cut specifically for the region of the head where it sits, which makes the cap super sleek and well-fitting ) 

2. A dope Quote ( Poor is flashy Rich is loud Wealth is quiet ) 

3. Chicago's notorious Buck 50 hats ( Custom designed sports hats featuring exotic animal skins that cost $150 ) 

The real goal with this design was to create a new silhouette for the standard 6-panel snap-back hat. This hat is a total reconstruction that now has a similar fit to the classic 5-panel hat.

 All Sales Final 
Only 12 pieces made

name: Rare Pieces Hoodie
description:
Very Rare Pieces is a limited edition capsule collection designed by Terrell Wright and executed by Barely Graduated. The design theme for this collection is heavily influenced by Japanese street wear which is generally characterized by its bold use of layering and experimental silhouettes; With that in mind Very Rare Pieces concentrates on the fit of the clothing, the details of the design, and a monochromatic imagery.  Extremely limited in quantity and of the highest quality... Very Rare Pieces   
 
The Rare Pieces Hoodie is a premium lightweight 6.5 oz. super soft 80/20 cotton/poly blend slim fit short sleeved leather cuffed pullover hooded sweatshirt with functional 12 inch nickel tooth zippers on the side. The words Rare and Pieces are screen printed on the hood and above the bottom elastic on the back of the hoodie.

The design for this hoodie is a little less Japanese streetwear inspired because it has more of a tailored slim fit cut than you would typically see. The idea was to create a hoodie that was light and well fitting that could be accompanied with other pieces without making the individual wearing it uncomfortable. This hoodie started off as a high quality lightweight long sleeved hoodie that was altered with zippers to the side for style and ventilation and hand sewn 100% authentic lambskin leather cuffed sleeves.
 
All Sales Final
Only 24 pieces made

name: Very Rare Cross Tee
description:
Very Rare Pieces is a limited edition capsule collection designed by Terrell Wright and executed by Barely Graduated. The design theme for this collection is heavily influenced by Japanese street wear which is generally characterized by its bold use of layering and experimental silhouettes; With that in mind Very Rare Pieces concentrates on the fit of the clothing, the details of the design, and a monochromatic imagery.  Extremely limited in quantity and of the highest quality... Very Rare Pieces  
 
 
The Very Rare Cross Baseball Tee is a 4.8 oz 50/50 cotton/poly blend with a severed fishtail bottom. The words Very Rare are screen printed on the front of the shirt and a full size cross covers the rear of the shirt.

The design for this shirt started with a bible verse ( 1 Peter 3:3 ). The idea was to celebrate the times in certain peoples lives when their "church clothes" were the only good clothes they had. The verse highlighted talks about not allowing your outward appearance to outshine your inner beauty. 


All Sales Final
Only 20 pieces made

name: Rare Soccer Jersey
description:
Very Rare Pieces is a limited edition capsule collection designed by Terrell Wright and executed by Barely Graduated. The design theme for this collection is heavily influenced by Japanese street wear which is generally characterized by its bold use of layering and experimental silhouettes; With that in mind Very Rare Pieces concentrates on the fit of the clothing, the details of the design, and a monochromatic imagery.  Extremely limited in quantity and of the highest quality... Very Rare Pieces  
 
The Rare Soccer Jersey is a 4.8 oz. 50/50 cotton/poly blend v-neck jersey with the word RARE screen printed on the front

The design on this jersey is minimalism at its finest. Not only was this the first item designed and manufactured from this collection but the entire collection as a whole was built around the simplicity and style of this piece.
 
All Sales Final
Only 20 pieces made
